title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When inputting 'new Date()' as content for three items and then saving and previewing, the dynamic text item shows a different format compared to the data/text item.
EB: The dynamic text item and the data/text item should display the same format for datetime values retrieved from the table.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Input 'new Date()' as the content for all three items.
2. Save the changes.
3. Preview the items and observe the datetime format in the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
